Welcome to
ESSE2017!

June 23rd - 25th, 2017
Suzhou, China

Welcome to ESSE2017!

The 2017 International Conference on Environmental Science and Sustainable Energy [ESSE2017] is an annual scientific international conference concentrating on Environmental Science and Sustainable Energy for experts and scholar in the corresponding fields. ESSE2017 will be held in Suzhou, China during June 23-25, 2017. The conference aims to provide a platform for experts, professionals, researchers and students in the areas to share the updated information and stimulate the communication with each other.

Environmental science is an interdisciplinary academic field that integrates physical, biological and information sciences (including ecology, biology, physics, chemistry, zoology, mineralogy, oceanology, limnology, soil science, geology, atmospheric science, and geodesy) to the study of the environment, and the solution of environmental problems. While Sustainable energy is energy that is consumed at insignificant rates compared to its supply and with manageable collateral effects, especially environmental effects. Another common definition of sustainable energy is an energy system that serves the needs of the present without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their needs.

All submissions must be original, unpublished, and not submitted concurrently for publication elsewhere. All accepted paper will be published by De Gruyter Publishers and be submitted by De Gruyter Publishers for EI and ISTP indexing.Excellent papers will be selected and recommended to SCI and EI journals.

Publication Guidelines

√All submissions must be original, unpublished, and not submitted concurrently for publication elsewhere.
√All accepted paper by ESSE2017 will be published by De Gruyter Publishers as a proceedings, and submit for EI and CPCI index.
√Excellent papers will be selected and recommended from the proceedings to SCI or EI journals for publication after the conference.

Conference Photos

The 2017 International Conference on Environmental Science and Sustainable Energy [ESSE2017] is a leading annual conference of environmental science and sustainable energy for all researchers home and abroad. Along with the exciting exhibition, ESSE2017 will be held in Suzhou, China,during June 23rd-25th, 2016. On behalf of the organizing committee, we'd like to send our honest invitation to all distinguished scholars and engineers.
